headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL) the Best Consumer Staples Dividend Stock To Invest In?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Consumer Staples Dividend Stocks To Invest In. headline: Colgate-Palmolive: Don't Get Your Hopes Up (Yet)
summary: Colgate-Palmolive's stock is trading at a discount to the level implied by current margins, but there is a good reason for that. Click to read why CL is a Hold.

headline: Household Products Q4 Earnings: Central Garden & Pet (NASDAQ:CENT) is the Best in the Biz
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how household products stocks fared in Q4, starting with Central Garden & Pet (NASDAQ:CENT).
